name: Wikipedia - Frontpage Redesign
description: Update: this style is contained in, and has been superceded by, the full-site style style 79374.
additional_info:
Cleans up and restyles www.wikipedia.org (this front page only), making it more attractive and bringing the footer buttons into easy access.
== Note: == If you like this but it conflicts with another style like a "dark wikipedia" style, go in to edit that style and at the top you should see something like: @-moz-document domain(wikipedia.org) replace that part with: @-moz-document regexp('https?://[^?]*wikipedia\.(com|org|net)/.+') (Technical: This is a pattern that will match any page on the wikipedia domain with a slash after the .com (or .org or .net) and more stuff after it, so the style won't apply to wikipedia.com plain, but it'll apply to subpages.)
